name: Standard Margin Excluding Inter-company
description: amount of profit Rockwell Automation earns on the given transaction (which could be a ""ship and bill"", or not) for products, projects, or services, stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
Standard Margin Excluding Inter-company Markup = Total Revenue (excluding Inter-company Transfer Markup and Transfer Costs) - Total Cost of Sales

The Standard Margin Excluding Inter-company Markup is a true measure of the profit earned at the company level â€” by excluding Inter-company Transfer Markup, there is no risk of double-counting that notional ""profit"" when revenue from all Rockwell Automation legal entities is combined.
